aboutDetails.title: About Lorik Myftari
aboutDetails.description: A dedicated and talented young goalkeeper with a strong desire to develop and succeed at an elite level in football.

cards.playerOverAgeDesc: Only 15 years old, Lorik has established himself in IFK Göteborg's U16 team, showing maturity and exceptional skill.
cards.goalkeeperDesc: As goalkeeper for IFK's U16 team, Lorik consistently demonstrates his saving skills and leadership on the pitch.
cards.futureGoalsDesc: With a dream to become a professional football player, Lorik trains purposefully every day to reach the highest level in the sport.

hero.name: Lorik Myftari
hero.forwardPathDesc: I am 15 years old and play as a goalkeeper for IFK Göteborg’s U16 team. With experience from Gothia SEF and international tournaments, I train purposefully to reach my full potential and make a difference on the pitch.
hero.trophyDesc: From silver in Barcelona to Gothia SEF champion, a journey of commitment and growth.
